sn11.13:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn11.13:1.3: Atha kho mahali licchavi yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahali licchavi bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn11.13:5.1: “Sakkanca khvaham, mahali, pajanami sakkakarane ca dhamme, yesam dhammanam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhaga, tanca pajanami.
sn11.13:6.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano magho nama manavo ahosi, tasma maghavati vuccati.
sn11.13:7.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano sakkaccam danam adasi, tasma sakkoti vuccati.
sn11.13:8.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano pure danam adasi, tasma purindadoti vuccati.
sn11.13:9.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano avasatham adasi, tasma vasavoti vuccati.
sn11.13:10.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo sahassampi atthanam muhuttena cinteti, tasma sahassakkhoti vuccati.
sn11.13:11.1: Sakkassa, mahali, devanamindassa suja nama asurakanna pajapati, tasma sujampatiti vuccati.
sn11.13:12.1: Sakko, mahali, devanamindo devanam tavatimsanam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareti, tasma devanamindoti vuccati.
sn11.13:13.1: Sakkassa, mahali, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhaga.
sn11.13:13.7: yavajivam vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavaseyyam muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato,
sn11.13:13.9: yavajivam akkodhano assam—sacepi me kodho uppajjeyya, khippameva nam pativineyyanti.
sn11.13:13.10: Sakkassa, mahali, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa imani satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhagati.
